long_description: Our small REI Digital Luggage scale helps you avoid overweight fees by providing quick, easy-to-read weight readouts of your luggage. Large digital display shows weight in either pounds or kilograms, displaying weight up to 100 lbs. (44 kg). Shaped to comfortably fit in 1 hand and its compact size makes it easy to bring along on your travels. Uses two CR2032 coin-size batteries, which are included; auto shutoff helps save battery power. Sturdy strap and buckle easily connect scale to luggage for secure, stable weighing. Can also be used for weighing packs and gear for ultralight pursuits.
